product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Cube Set
long_description: Up your organizational skills with this extremely lightweight Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Cube Set-a smart, simple and efficient way to pack your T-shirts, shorts and socks! Constructed of lightweight ripstop silicone-impregnated nylon, fabric is highly tear resistant, self-healing in nature, and weather- and stain-resistant. Translucent fabric allows visibility inside for quick identification of items. Clamshell zipper opening provides easy access. Convenient grab handle offers easy transport. Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Cube set includes: 1 Quarter Cube, 1 Half Cube and 1 Cube.
short_description: Up your organizational skills with this extremely lightweight Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Cube Set-a smart, simple and efficient way to pack your T-shirts, shorts and socks!
